entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Port au Choix
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:10 AM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Daniel's Harbour 1:30 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

Humidity: 91 %

Dewpoint: -7.2°C
Wind: ESE 21 km/h gust 30 km/h

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow or freezing drizzle. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow changing to freezing drizzle before morning. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 14 January 2023
